page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: EVERY NIGHT I PUT ON MY NIGHTIE,CLEAN MY TEETH AND GO TO BED.IN THE MORNING I DRESS,HAVE MY BREAKFAST,POLISH MY SHOES,BRUSH MY HAIR AND TIE IT UP. ON THE WAY TO SCHOOL I CROSS A ROAD NEAR A FIELD WHERE THERE IS A SHETLAND PONY.BEFORE I CROSS I LOOK AND LISTEN TO MAKE SURE IT IS SAFE.WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL I GO INTO THE CLASS ROOM.I GET OUT MY SPELLING BOOK AND WRITE MY SPELLINGS DOWN.WE HAVE ASSEMBLY WHEN WE SING HYMNS AND PRAY.IN CLASS I GET MY MATHEMATICS BOOK AND WORK IN IT UNTIL PLAYTIME.ON MONDAY WE WATCH TELEVISION AND WRITE ABOUT IT.SOON IT IS LUNCH TIME WHEN MRS.JAMES AND MRS. MOSCROP LOOK AFTER US.IN THE AFTERNOON WE WRITE STORIES,READ AND PAINT AND FINISH BY SWIMMING IN THE SCHOOL POOL.
